mapper.select: SELECT c.caid AS caId, pd.pdid AS pdId, pd.pdshotcount AS pdShotCount, pd.pdcount AS pdCount, p.prid AS prId, p.prname AS prName, p.prprice AS prPrice, p.primage AS prImgData, p.prinfo AS prInfo, b.bopname AS bopName, s.sopname AS sopName, t.topname AS topName FROM cart c JOIN productDetail pd ON c.pdid = pd.pdid JOIN product p ON pd.prid = p.prid JOIN beansOption b ON pd.bopid = b.bopid JOIN tempOption t ON pd.topid = t.topid JOIN sizeOption s ON pd.sopid = s.sopid WHERE c.acid = #{acId} ORDER BY caId ASC
mapper.insert:
select paId_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO PAYMENT(paId, paDate, acId, paName, paTel, brId, paRequest, paPay) VALUES (#{paId}, SYSDATE, #{acId}, #{paName}, #{paTel}, #{brId}, #{paRequest}, #{paPay})

select padId_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO PAYMENTDETAIL(padId, paId, pdId) VALUES (#{padId}, #{paId}, #{pdId})
mapper.select: SELECT pay.paId as paId, pay.paName as paName, pay.paTel as paTel, pay.paDate as paDate, pay.paRequest as paRequest, br.brName as brName, p.prName as prName, p.prPrice as prPrice, bop.bopName as bopName, top.topName as topName, pd.pdShotCount as pdShotCount, pd.pdCount as pdCount FROM payment pay INNER JOIN paymentDetail pad ON pay.paId = pad.paId INNER JOIN productDetail pd ON pad.pdId = pd.pdId INNER JOIN branch br ON pay.brid = br.brid INNER JOIN product p ON pd.prId = p.prId INNER JOIN beansOption bop ON pd.bopId = bop.bopId INNER JOIN sizeOption sop ON pd.sopId = sop.sopId INNER JOIN tempOption top ON pd.topId = top.topId WHERE pay.acId = #{acId} ORDER BY pay.paid ASC
